title: Ariane 6 is the future of European heavy-lift launch — for better or worse
content:
Europe’s next-generation launch vehicle, the Ariane 6, is poised to lift off for the first time tomorrow, as the continent looks to build out sovereign access to space and ensure European missions are launched by European rockets.  The heavy-lift rocket will launch from the Guiana Space Centre in French Guiana, with a four-hour launch window […]

title: Amazon revives its Echo Spot with an upgraded look and improved audio
content:
Amazon has released an all-new version of its Echo Spot ahead of Prime Day, the company announced on Monday. The 2024 version of the Alexa-enabled smart alarm clock costs $79.99, but is currently on sale for $44.99 for Prime members. The company says the latest iteration of the product comes with better visuals and improved […]

title: TechCrunch Minute: How to protect yourself from AI scams
content:
You probably like to think of yourself as reasonably sophisticated when it comes to online scams — you’re not opening random email attachments or sending money to Nigerian princes. But of course, scams evolve with new technology. AI makes it even easier to perform these attacks at scale, while introducing a little personalization that makes […]

title: Delivery Hero warns it could face €400M antitrust fine
content:
Berlin-based food delivery giant Delivery Hero has warned investors it may “ultimately” face an antitrust fine of up to €400 million. The development, reported earlier by Reuters, follows unannounced raids by European Union authorities on the offices of Delivery Hero and its Spanish subsidiary Glovo back in July 2022 and November 2023. The EU did […]

title: Epic Games CEO promises to ‘fight’ Apple over ‘absurd’ changes
content:
It sounds like the latest dispute between Apple and Fortnite-maker Epic Games isn’t over. Epic has been fighting Apple for years over the company’s revenue-sharing requirements in the App Store. While Epic’s antitrust lawsuit against Apple was defeated last year, many of its criticisms were echoed in a different lawsuit filed against Apple in March […]

title: What happens if you shoot down a delivery drone?
content:
As deep-pocketed companies like Amazon, Google and Walmart invest in and experiment with drone delivery, a phenomenon reflective of this modern era has emerged. Drones, carrying snacks and other sundries, are being shot out of the sky.  Incidents are still rare. However, a recent arrest in Florida, in which a man allegedly shot down a […]

title: Waymo robotaxi pulled over by Phoenix police after driving into the wrong lane
content:
A police officer pulled over a self-driving Waymo vehicle in Phoenix after it ran a red light and pulled into a lane of oncoming traffic, according to dispatch records. The incident took place on June 19, but local media, including Arizona Republic, released bodycam footage of the traffic stop this week, showing the vehicle weaving […]
